class_notes:
(Same as LING 309 1)
Prior completion of PSYC 110, or PSYC 111, or AP/IB credit in psychology or equivalent.
course_description: This course examines the relationship between brain mechanisms and language behavior. Topics include aphasia and language disorders, aphasia in the deaf, critical periods in children, and gender differences in brain organization.
sections: Class Nbr: 2805, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: B. Yamasaki, Status: Wait List
